sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: And the Cannes Film Festival's Palme d'Or goes to French director Justine Trillet for her courtroom drama, Anatomy of a Fall.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian President Vladimir Zelensky has condemned a Russian airstrike on a hospital in Dnipro that left two dead and many more injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Turkey's incumbent President Recep Tayyip Erdogan and rival candidate Kemal Kılıçdaroğlu closed their campaign trails before Sunday's election runoff.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Extinction Rebellion climate activists in The Hague block a major highway to

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: protest against the government's allocation of fossil fuel subsidies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The Cannes Film Festival's top prize, the Palme d'Or, is staying at home. Going to Je ne peux pas ne pas venir ici en recevant un prix sans être aussi le témoin, le reflet de ce qui se passe profondément dans la société.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: On vit quelque chose d'exceptionnel cette année, cette année vraiment exceptionnelle.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: La révolte qui s'est passée dans les rues a été vraiment quelque chose qui m'a, même si j'étais en travail et pas dans l'action, c'est quelque chose qui m'a énormément touchée.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Je ne peux pas être séparée de ça.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The film tells the story of a writer, played by German actress Sandra Uhler, accused of murdering her husband.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The festival's other big winner was Jonathan Glazer's The Zone of Interest, based on a book by British author Martin Amis, who died earlier this month. Despite soaring inflation, the collapse of the lira and a range of domestic issues, Turkey's incumbent president, Recep Tayyip Erdogan, is still favoured to extend his 20 years in power by five more.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Upon addressing his supporters in Beykoz, Istanbul, at the last rally before the second round of the presidential elections, Erdogan said, our nation will win with all its colours.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, National Alliance presidential candidate Kemal Kılıçdaroğlu used the last day of his campaign trail to speak at a family support insurance meeting.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The opposition leader promised support for low-income families if he is elected president.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The 74-year-old, who recently increased his anti-refugee rhetoric, has focused his campaign strategy on restoring the economy and earthquake relief following February's devastating quakes that killed more than 50,000 people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has expressed his condolences Український президент Володимир Зеленський вибачив свій вибачення викликів російського вибуху на лікарні в Дніпрі.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Вибух вбив дві і вбив більше 30 людей, виміщені двома дочурами, відео 3 та 6. The missile hit a clinic that offered mental health services as a part of a larger hospital, said the mayor of the city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Sources say 19 people have been hospitalized along with the boys.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Local media posted footage of rescuers helping people with blood on their faces escape from the clinic through corridors full of rubble.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Thousands of climate activists from Extinction Rebellion blocked the Utrecht-Saban highway in The Hague to protest against fossil fuel subsidies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Police used water cannons to clear the road but they failed to disperse the crowds.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The environmental protest group which was founded in the UK in 2018 claims the Dutch government is spending five times the budget dedicated to fighting climate change on the fossil fuel sector. Our correspondent Vicentio Genovese sent this report from The Hague. spendendo cinque volte il budget dedicato a combattere il cambiamento climatico sul settore del combustibile fossile.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Il nostro corrispondente Vincenzo Genovese ha messo questo rapporto dal Hague.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I manifestanti chiedono al governo olandese di interrompere gli incentivi finanziari all'industria fossile e di dirottare gli extraprofitti di queste aziende in azioni contro il cambiamento climatico, ma anche di istituire un'assemblea cittadina per decidere come i Paesi Bassi possano diventare neutrali dal punto di vista climatico entro il 2025.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Finora i cannoni ad acqua della Polizia non li hanno fermati e l'obiettivo è di resistere a oltranza e di bloccare questa strada.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Vincenzo Genovese, Euronews, Laia.
